mapper.select: SELECT i.*, w.warehouse_name, m.material_name AS product_name, m.material_code AS product_code, m.image_url FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id LEFT JOIN material m ON i.material_id = m.id WHERE i.id = #{id}
